name: Hotel Villa Romantic & Spa
description: Villa Romantic is located in Paris, 2.2 km from AccorHotels Arena and 3.1 km from Notre Dame Cathedral. Every room has a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is provided. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Opéra Bastille is 2.3 km from Villa Romantic, while Louvre Museum is 5.5 km from the property. Orly Airport is 13 km away.

name: Ibiza Corso Hotel & Spa
description: Ibiza Corso Hotel & Spa is a luxury hotel located in the exclusive area of Marina Botafoch Harbour. It offers free access to its gym and unique spa with crystal walls. Each stylish, air-conditioned room at the Ibiza Corso has free WiFi, a balcony and a flat-screen TV. There is also a safe, and a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. There are 2 restaurants, one with panoramic views and the other one located in the pool area. You will find an outdoor pool and an indoor one at the spa. The spa also has several types of showers, steam baths and an oxygen room. Pachá nightclub is 15 minutes’ walk away. Ibiza Airport is 11 km away.

name: Cinemovie
address: 175 Via Nomentana primo piano Interno 5, 00161 Rome

name: Ibis Styles Roma Aurelia
description: The ibis Styles Roma Aurelia is new: inaugurated in April 2022, it offers solutions for all types of travelers. Our hotel is located a few steps from the Via Aurelia, a few kilometers from the major attractions of Rome and 20 minutes from Fiumicino Airport. Enjoy the spacious lobby. An open and dynamic space, designed both for work, with comfortable tables and chairs, and for fun and relaxation.accorhotels.com

name: The First Roma Arte
description: This 5-star boutique hotel is in Rome's historic centre an 8-minute walk from the Spanish Steps. It offers a panoramic rooftop terrace, 24-hour personal assistance and room service and elegant rooms with free WiFi. The First Roma is a member of LVX Collection of Preferred Hotels & Resorts. It is a 2-minute walk from Richard Meyer Ara Pacis Museum, a 5-minute walk from Flaminio Metro Station and 750 metres from the Spanish Steps. Exclusive boutique shops on Via Condotti are 550 metres from the property. Rooms at The First Roma feature contemporary works of art and modern furniture. Each comes with iPod docks, soft bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Some suites boast a terrace with hot tub. Guests can enjoy seafood at the Michelin-starred Acquolina restaurant as well as the rooftop Acquaroof restaurant. A lobby bar and a free fitness area are also available on site.
